scripts.dev: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:frontend: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.dev:backend: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && cd backend && npm start
scripts.install:all: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && cd backend && npm run build
